overview:
David Kierzkowski is Co-Founder and Head of Product Development at Tapclicks.

He is a serial entrepreneur, technology visionary who takes strategic ownership of shaping new products, features and implementing new technologies. Before TapClicks he was Co-Founder/CTO of Vyoom, where he contributed to overall strategy and set direction for social product development. Prior to that David was a consultant who led web and product development initiatives to create and enhance digital presence for e-commerce sites for a variety of online and offline businesses.
